metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42852 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixedin Safari 16.2, tvOS 16.2, macOS Ventura 13.1, iOS 15.7.2 and iPadOS15.7.2, iOS 16.2 and iPadOS 16.2, watchOS 9.2. Processing maliciouslycrafted web content may result in the disclosure of process memory.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in esm-infra/bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
